Technical Topics

Data Management

Import, validate, and manage geological datasets efficiently using Orebit applications. Learn best practices for data structure and quality control.

Statistical Analysis

Master statistical techniques for geological data including distribution analysis, outlier detection, and multivariate methods.

Spatial Analysis

Understand spatial patterns, variography, and geostatistical modeling for accurate resource estimation.

3D Visualization

Create interactive 3D geological models, cross-sections, and visualizations for better data understanding.

R Shiny Development

Learn to customize and extend Orebit applications or build your own geological R Shiny apps.

Quality Assurance

Implement robust QA/QC procedures for geological data analysis and resource modeling.

Why These Resources Matter

Product-Focused Learning
Every tutorial is designed specifically for Orebit applications, ensuring you can immediately apply what you learn.

Real-World Workflows
Guides based on actual geological projects, not theoretical examples. Learn workflows that work in production environments.

Progressive Difficulty
Start with basics and progress to advanced techniques. Each guide builds on previous knowledge.

Open Source Philosophy
All code examples and workflows are transparent, reproducible, and freely available.
